title: Mobile Learning Support Library Utilization Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone/tablet proficiency and foundational library resource search skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning linked to science curricula, providing experiential learning environments using mobile devices and library resources.

learning_goals: Students can independently explore library electronic resources (DBs, e-books, academic articles, etc.) through a mobile learning system.
Students can effectively utilize learning materials by library space in a simulation environment utilizing location-based technology.
Students can collect and analyze materials needed for science projects (theme: environmental change) through VR-based library experiences.
Students can creatively design project outcomes using digital devices (tablets/smartphones).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
